children.value:
import { Playground, Props } from "docz";
import { InputEmail } from ".";
InputEmail is used to display an input with built in email validation
when you expect the user to input an email address.
If you are not worried about email address validation, consider using

will validate email addresses. You can pass in
additional validations as well.

<Playground>
  <InputEmail
    placeholder="Enter your email"
    validations={{
      required: { value: true, message: "Email address is required" },
    }}
  />
</Playground>
